import { Component, OnInit, Injectable } from '@angular/core'; import { ConfigService } from './config/config.service'; import { Block } from './model/block'; @Injectable() @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'], }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { constructor(private config: ConfigService) {} menu = { home: 'Home', about: 'About', gallery: 'Gallery' }; block: any = { total_block_produced_within_time: 1, total_missed_blocks: 1, duration_in_hrs: 1, number_of_validators: 1, }; async ngOnInit(): Promise { const response = (await this.config.getMissedBlock()).subscribe((data) => { console.log(data); this.block = data; }); } }
